summary: This mod adds HD texture to one of the best and most powerfull (Ok, maybe not, but they\'re still cool) beast in Skyrim, the Horkers. Size increased to 2048x2048.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds HD texture to one of the best and most powerfull (Ok, maybe not, but they\'re still cool) beast in Skyrim, the Horkers. Now you can fight HD Horkers at all times. All images are from dead Horkers, since dead Horkers do not move.
 Size increased to 2048x2048.

=======================================
HOW TO INSTALL:
=======================================
1.-Unzip
2.-Place actor folder in Skyrim/Data folder.
3.-Enjoy

=======================================
HOW TO UNINSTALL
=======================================
1.-Delete the horker folder in Skyrin/Data/textures/actors


Please leave a comment!
author: Demosthenes Ark
